adqlParser.query
Class ADQLTable

java.lang.Object
  adqlParser.query.ADQLTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ADQLObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
SaadaADQLTable
public class ADQLTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ADQLObject

It represents any item of the clause FROM: a table name or a sub-query.
A table reference may have an alias (MUST if it is a sub-query) and a join with another table.

Version:
06/2010
Author:
Grégory Mantelet (CDS)

replaceBy

public ADQLObject replaceBy(SearchHandler searchCondition,
                            ADQLObject replacementObject)
                     throws ParseException
Description copied from interface: ADQLObject
Replaces the first ADQL object which has matched by the given ADQL object.

Specified by:
replaceBy in interface ADQLObject
Parameters:
searchCondition - The search condition that the ADQL object to replace must satisfy.
replacementObject - The ADQL object which must replace the first ADQL object which has matched.

The replaced ADQL object or null if no object has been found or replaced.

ParseException - If there is any error during the replacement.
